alert.note: Alert for Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 2:27AM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Grant County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
